val dfSource = spark.read.json("abfss://synapse@isphere.dfs.core.windows.net/D365/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging_*.json")

val dfJournal = dfSource.withColumn("SITE", split(col("LEDGERACCOUNT"), "-").getItem(1))

val df = dfJournal.join(dfSite, dfJournal("SITE") === dfSite("code_site")).select(
                dfJournal("ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE").alias("ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE"),
                dfJournal("ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT").alias("ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT"),
                dfJournal("ACCOUNTINGDATE").alias("ACCOUNTINGDATE"),
                dfJournal("DESCRIPTION").alias("DESCRIPTION"),
                dfJournal("DOCUMENTDATE").alias("DOCUMENTDATE"),
                dfJournal("POSTINGTYPE").alias("POSTINGTYPE"),
                dfJournal("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT").alias("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT"),
                dfJournal("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT").alias("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT"),
                dfJournal("SITE").alias("SITE"),
                dfSite("code_site"),
                dfSite("id_site"),
                (current_timestamp()).as("date_integration")
        )
df.show(2)

val currDateTime = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd_HHmmss").format(System.currentTimeMillis())
val file_path = "abfss://synapse@isphere.dfs.core.windows.net/DWH/site/site_" + currDateTime.toString() + ".parquet"
df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(file_path)
